long_description: Built for heavy-duty and rescue work, the Rescucender's spring-loaded design helps prevent damage to rope under shock loading. Curved cam spreads the clamping force over a larger area of rope, minimizing damage and chance of rope failure. Small diameter cable attaches jaw to body and provides spring action. Made of milled--not cast--component for high strength and durability--rated to 26 kN.
short_description: Built for heavy-duty and rescue work, the Rescucender's spring-loaded design helps prevent damage to rope under shock loading.
